sqlMap.update:
MERGE INTO QZ_MX MX USING (SELECT #qzid# AS QZID, #hhIns# AS HH, #zdjhIns# AS ZDJH, #bjjhIns# AS BJJH FROM DUAL) MX2
ON (MX.BJJH = MX2.BJJH AND MX.QZID = MX2.QZID)
ON (MX.ZDJH = MX2.ZDJH AND MX.QZID = MX2.QZID)
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MX.HH = MX2.HH WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(MX.QZID,MX.HH,MX.ZDJH,MX.BJJH) VALUES(MX2.QZID,MX2.HH,MX2.ZDJH,MX2.BJJH)
